item.title: Bill to end government shutdown survives key hurdle before House-wide vote
item.description: The House is set to vote Wednesday on ending the government shutdown after the funding bill clears a key committee hurdle.

item.title: Reagan-appointed judge resigns in protest of Trump, warns of president's 'assault on the rule of law'
item.description: A federal judge resigned in protest over President Donald Trump's "assault on rule of law," citing the president's partisan use of the justice system.

item.title: Republican erupts at Democrat during shutdown hearing: 'My people aren't getting paid thanks to you'
